title: Research API Integration
description: Research an external API and implement an integration based on the documentation.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Research API Integration

Research an API and implement a client for it.

## Objectives
1. Research the JSONPlaceholder API (free fake API)
2. Document the available endpoints
3. Create a client that wraps the API

objectives.description: Client has methods for API calls

hints.text: JSONPlaceholder is at jsonplaceholder.typicode.com. Ask Claude to look up its documentation.
Try: 'Research JSONPlaceholder API, document its endpoints, and create an API client'

Ask: 'Look up jsonplaceholder.typicode.com documentation. Create api-docs.md listing all endpoints. Then create apiClient.js with methods: getPosts(), getPost(id), getUsers(), createPost(data). Include error handling.'

solution.approach: Research the API documentation and create a client based on findings.
solution.example: Research JSONPlaceholder API and create a client library
alternativeApproaches: Implement one endpoint at a time

learningPoints: Wrap APIs in clean client interfaces
